name: World Simulator
description:
This is my entry to Ludum Dare 38

In this game you play as a hikikomori who has shut theirself in their apartment. So, the apartment has become their entire "World"

Your job is to keep they alive, and possibly, happy.

(This game is crude and unpolished, the parameters haven't been carefully tuned to make this game playable. Apologies.)
